pages.title: Rotary Pump
pages.text: The <item>Rotary Pump/$ is a <thing>$(l:intro/rotary)rotary/$ powered fluid pump. It collects fluid source blocks from the world, and allows it to be moved around in pipes.$(br2)It <em>only collects fluid sources directly underneath it/$. This means is it usually only useful for collecting water, and not for draining

lakes or ponds.$(br2)It connects to a gear or axle on the top, and only works if the attached gear/axle is spinning in the <em>positive direction/$ (counter-clockwise). It runs faster at higher <thing>speeds/$.
